overview: An intelligence bureau officer Suriyan (Sarathkumar) is falsely implicated in the murder of a top politician. He escapes from the pursuing Police and lands in the quaint mountain town of Top Slip. Here, he passes off as a nomad and begins working as a daily wages labourer. However, he comes across some suspicious activities and is also forced into marriage. Suddenly, Suriyan's past comes back to haunt his present and everything goes haywire.
title: Suriyan
